name: KC Flip
description: Inspired by the Kelly Criterion coin flip experiment. Manage your money effectively in 300 weighted coin flips to get the highscore. Each flip the chances for each side will be shown and you can decide how much of your money you want to bet. After 300 coin flips your current score will be automatically submitted and the game restarts. The game needs online connectivity to cloud load/save your game state and submit the highscore.
